What a ride! 10/10

Portal 2 ist ein wirklich sehr gutes Spiel. Es hat eine gelungene Story und die Rätsel sind auch gut. Zudem gibt es einen Mehrspielermodus, den man auch mit zufäligen Partnern spielen kann. Man kann eigenne Testkammern erstellen und es gibt gute Mods z.B. Portal Stories Mel. Das einzige negative ist, dass mein Controller nicht erkannt wurde und es auch keinen Support gibt, an den man sich wenden kann. Ich kann dieses spiel wirklich nur wei­ter­emp­feh­len.

¿Por qué comprar el juego? Simple, si tienes una conexion a internet puedes disfrutar de cámaras hechas por la comunidad, si tienes un amigo con el juego podrás jugar un Modo Historia Coop o jugar cámaras con él; O si no dispones de un amigo que tenga el juego, ¡Puedes buscar uno en hilos de discucion o encontrarlo mediante la busqueda online!

Es un juego con una historia que te atrapa de principio a fin, "concluyendo" la historia que se desarrolla en el primer juego, aunque quizás dejando algun que otro cable suelto. El juego es un poco largo quizá, aunque será rapido si sabes como resolver cada prueba; Una vez acabes el modo historia, puedes dedicarte a conseguir los logros que te faltan ¡Y empezar el Modo Historia Coop!
Puedes crear tus propias cámaras, tus propias pruebas y hacer que amigos u otras personas las jueguen.

Un juego de 10 que puede darte infinitas horas de entretenimiento. 10/10.

Que decir....
Buenos puzles, una buena dinámica de juego, una buena duración y una historia entretenida que te mantiene enganchado durante todo el juego.
Sin duda uno de los mejores juegos de puzles que he jugado.
simply amazing
Mt bom.... nada contra, historia bem bolada, e tem um belo criador d fases pra viajar bastante
Funny/interesting story mode and really cool co-op mode. Also fun to muck around with the portals and fooling around with your mates. Great fun. A++

Portal is a fun, education game. The physics and concept makes the game look and seem better. 
The graphics are pretty good. The whole idea of using Portals to solve each puzzle is tremendous.  
The difficulty does raise throughout every puzzle and chamber. 

VALVE have done exceptionally well in developing Portal and Portal 2. I hope VALVE decide to make Portal 3!!!

I would highly recommend this game to everyone!

4.5/5 - Portal 2

Polecam mocne 10/10

The first game in a very long time i've been honestly and genuinely saddened to finish, not because of some emotional rollercoaster of a story, but because there is nothing else (except portal 1) quite like this on the market, and i fear for many years there will never be a game as good as this, 15.5 hours to complete the game because i sometimes spent 40 minutes scratching my head and yelling at my screen over stupid puzzles which were blatantly obvious once i'd completed them, i 100% recommend you get this game and i know you'll genuinely really enjoy it, im not a puzzler/platformer kind of guy i love my fps games but my god, this is a real gem. 10/10

I'm not one to play puzzle games but having a sarcastic self-aware AI as a FRENEMY made the entire game fun ! Definately one of my Top 10 Favourite games :D  . update : Still one of the best Game out there

应该是万圣节特惠？忘记了，反正就是账户里刚好有些钱，就入了她。直到现在放假，有了时间，就开始仔细玩这款游戏，然后就是深陷其中，根本停不下来~~！有什么会比她更适合让物理迷忘我把玩的呢？我刚刚通关了单人模式，真的是有些感概~~一关接一关，有趣的剧情，真实的坠空感，在高楼跳下，那种视觉冲击真的是十分给力。有趣的凝胶，真实的花样繁多。个人表示最喜欢加速凝胶啦~还有最后的歌曲，真的是太有爱啦~~好评~~!!!坐等以后和基友玩耍，再以后和女友玩耍，想想就激动不已~~~！！！入吧，朋友们，真的是好。
最后个人觉得要提醒一点：晕3D的慎入~~！

Um jogo com uma história sensacional,jogabilidade ótima,e é claro uma física perfeita,durante o jogo,se você ouvir alguns áudios do Cave Johnson você recebe indícios de como será o final,mas só percebe isso depois do final,o jogo é realmente muito bom,GLaDOS aquela personagem que você odiava no primeiro jogo,você começa a gostar a partir de um ponto do jogo,e o Coop,o que dizer dele?extremamente bom com um final muito criativo,me tornei um grande fã de Portal e recomendo a todos que comprem esse jogo

"Portal is perfect. Portal 2 is not. It's something better than that. It's human: hot-blooded, silly, poignant, irreverent, base, ingenious and loving. It's never less than a pure video game, but it's often more, and it will no doubt stand as one of the best entertainments in any medium at the end of this year. It's a masterpiece" - By Oli Welsh from Eurogamer

Tahle hra mě naprosto uchvátila nejen že je to dobrá příběhová hra, ale i dobrý CO-OP. V příběhu mě uchvatil příběh ten se skládá s 8 kapitol alespoň nebudete sedět u toho 1-2 . Hra mě pobavila vtipnými scénami a nějakými scénami. Co se týče CO-OPu tak jde vidět že autoři mysleli na všechno. Od dvou kamarádů co je jeden velký a chytrý a druhej kterej je malej, hloupější, a tlustej. V co-op tam máte různá kola kde se naučíte různé dovednosti.
Tahle hra se mi líbila a byla ÚŽASNÁ!!!. Tuhle hru dokážu hodnotit jenom palcem na horu. Pokud tuhle hru chcete koupit tak jen doporučuji.

This is a puzzle game, just in case you were unable to figure that out. You can beat the entire storyline in a afternoon but there is replay value. Yes the game does tie into the Half-life serries but you do not need to know anything from Half-life 2 to understand the entire storyline. While this game stresses your brain, do not look up walk throughs, it will ruin the pourpose of the game and its theme.
I think this is am amazing game!! I can finnaly 420 fedora noscope newbs with my mlg 360 portal gun m9. 10/10 would bang.

Portal 2 for me was a really fun and cool game, it was the first PC game I've bought and I still enjoy it. The game is pretty simple but fun, you shoot portals and solve puzzels. The story is also pretty cool and Portal 2 is a game that most people can enjoy and not find it to be too diffictult or challenging. Even though this game is fun I wouldn't reccomend it if you own a Mac, the game freezes every few seconds on the Mac even when I don't have it in fullscreen. On Windows it seems like Portal 2 runs just fine. Another issue I found and this is probably just my controller is I had to adjust the controlls as when I first plugged in my controller. The A and B buttons were swapped, but like I said I think it was just my controller. Overall I would give this game a 9 out of 10, it is a really fun game, but if you have a Mac you may run into issues.

The moment I saw GLaDOS' lifeless body, I made Chell teabag her face while staring right into Wheatley's eye.

The game's a work of art, what else can I say? Portal jumping with little to no consequence has never been this exciting.

Generalmente dedico el tiempo que paso en Steam a jugar y nada más, pero me parece que la saga Portal y Half Life merecen ser recomendadas a quien no las conozca. La saga Portal se ambienta en el universo H-L, y por si sola vale la pena. Esta continuación incrementa la calidad del original, y convierte a Glados en un personaje más profundo. Totalmente recomendado a cualquier tipo de jugador (te gusten o no los rompecabezas).
